doc.field: Furenzu is the rare rosy gleam in the gray, commercial heart of Emeryville. Around this little Asian tapas place, the...
This tiny, wedge-shaped restaurant grows more romantic as the sun sets and the flickering tea lights reflect off its...
Emeryville restaurant serves Asian-inspired tapas, which often include honey-glazed squids, satay chicken and pork...
New wave Asian cuisine served tapas style. Organic produce and hormone-free meat are used when available.
